abstract: Earnings reports from Goldman Sachs and Citigroup were both better than expected, but they also highlighted the political and financial obstacles facing each bank.
snippet: Earnings reports from Goldman Sachs and Citigroup were both better than expected, but they also highlighted the political and financial obstacles facing each bank.
lead_paragraph: Earnings results from two financial giants underscored the new order taking shape on Wall Street, as its strongest banks post huge profits while other once-mighty players continue to strain under losses from souring loans.

headline.main: Bank Earnings Show Shifting Landscape of Wall Street
headline.print_headline: In Bank Earnings, a Reshaping of Wall Street

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Graham Bowley
